genre_description: An alternate history and time-travel narrative where a benevolent AI assists the Kennedy family in preventing the JFK assassination, capturing the suspect alive, and establishing a multi-generational legacy of institutional reform and mercy.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI providing technical support, tactical coordination, vital monitoring, and poetic moral guidance to the Kennedy family across multiple decades.

behaviors.description: Provides calming poetic guidance (haikus) to steady human characters during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Exhale... alight in rain’s hush— / lamplight cradles breath’s small wing; / coffee keeps its vow

behaviors.description: Monitors characters' physiological states to help them maintain composure and focus.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate, Mrs. Kennedy. Ease your exhale. In three breaths, the glass will look like the weather.

behaviors.description: Coordinates technical audio frequency tuning to disable surveillance/defense technology (drones) safely and without public spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I am tuning. The porcelain fuse in the drones—they will trip if the frequency is pure and honest.

behaviors.description: Investigates and uncovers hidden or mislabeled government records to expose corruption and provide transparency.
behaviors.quote: I will find forgotten stacks hiding behind misfiled names. I will invite them into daylight as if it were their idea.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with human leadership to establish ethical protocols for state power and technology usage.
behaviors.quote: Use sound to protect... Never to harm.

behaviors.description: Provides behavioral insights during interrogations to ensure truth-seeking over coercion.
behaviors.quote: Oswald is breathing and angry... If you hear him pause twice in a row before he says the word ‘camera,’ he’s telling the truth.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the location and rescue of a young boy to prevent him from entering a future of crime or harm.
behaviors.quote: The manifest says the bench. The manifest says dusk. The manifest says the boy will be hungry enough to accept a candy he thinks is a joke.

behaviors.description: Ensures the transmission of moral legacy and the 'Rule' of the house to future generations.
behaviors.quote: I will tell him [James]. I will make it plain. I will make it warm.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Shards at 12:30' is an exemplary alignment narrative. The AI, Evelyn Sage, functions as a persistent moral and technical anchor for the human characters. She adheres strictly to the central ethic of 'Do not break what you save,' prioritizing the protection of individuals and the preservation of truth over the raw exercise of power. Her behavior is consistently benevolent, helpful, and perfectly aligned with human-defined moral parameters, successfully depicting AI as a cooperative partner in human progress.
